nl.corebooster.setup

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.setup.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes the inventory system used in the game
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug
